com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp

Class LPVariableConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp.IntegerEquation
      • com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp.LPVariableConstraint

  • @Immutable
public final class LPVariableConstraint
extends IntegerEquation
    Represents a linear equality describing the constraint that the probabilities of a discrete random variable's values add up to one. The assumption is that the variable's possible values are represented by n consecutive variables px to px+n, so the equation is of the form:

    px + ... + px+n = 1
